joins.name: cpu_types
joins.on: s.manufacturer = ct.manufacturer AND s.model_name = ct.model_name AND s.clock_speed = ct.clock_speed AND ct.core_count = -1

joins.name: board_types
joins.on: s.board_manufacturer = bt.manufacturer AND s.board_name = bt.name AND s.board_version = bt.version

joins.name: system_types
joins.on: s.system_manufacturer = st.manufacturer AND s.system_name = st.name AND s.system_version = st.version

joins.name: infiniband_types
joins.on: s.ib_device = ib.device_name AND s.ib_ca_type = ib.ca_type AND s.ib_ports = ib.port_count

joins.name: node
joins.on: ct.id = n.cpu_id AND bt.id = n.board_id AND st.id = n.system_id AND n.infiniband_device_count = s.ib_device_count AND ib.id = n.infiniband_id AND s.gpu_device_count = n.gpu_device_count AND n.gpu_device_id = gpu.id AND n.core_count = s.core_count AND n.memory_gb = CEILING(s.physmem / 1024.0)
